response.precondition: (intrusion.destination == Asset.DoIP) and (intrusion.source != Asset.OBD_II) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.OBD_II) and (intrusion.source != Asset.DoIP) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Cellular_module) and (intrusion.source != Asset.DSRC_for_IoV) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.DSRC_for_IoV) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Cellular_module) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Ultrasonic) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Surround_camera) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Surround_camera) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Ultrasonic) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Front_camera) and (intrusion.source != Asset.LiDAR) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Radar) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.LiDAR) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Front_camera) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Radar) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Radar) and (intrusion.source != Asset.Front_camera) and (intrusion.source != Asset.LiDAR)

not ( (intrusion.destination == Asset.Engine_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Transmission_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Battery_management) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Combustion_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Airbag_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Instrument_cluster) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.TPMS_receiver) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.OBD_II) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Light_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Wiper_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Key_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Climate_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Door_Trunk_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Steering_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Acceleration_control) or (intrusion.destination == Asset.Brake_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Engine_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Transmission_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Battery_management) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Combustion_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Airbag_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Instrument_cluster) or (intrusion.source == Asset.TPMS_receiver) or (intrusion.source == Asset.OBD_II) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Light_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Wiper_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Key_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Climate_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Door_Trunk_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Steering_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Acceleration_control) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Brake_control) )

(intrusion.source == Asset.Front_camera) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Surround_camera) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Radar) or (intrusion.source == Asset.LiDAR) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Ultrasonic) or (intrusion.source == Asset.WiFi_hotspot) or (intrusion.source == Asset.USB_port) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Video_screens) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Bluetooth) or (intrusion.source == Asset.Speech_recognition) or (intrusion.source == Asset.UKW_DAB)
